My only question here is: Why didn't the Apollo 13 movie portray actual events? I mean, it can be a good movie but from what I heard it isn't that real.

It portrayed it extremely accurately... It left some of the details out such as the star confidence check, sun alignment or LM battery explosion but that was because they had a time restraint for the movie.

I loved this movie

Also, they didn't die.
